	border: 1px solid darkgrey;
	background: transparent;
}

/* PAGE */ .ic_page {
	width: 950px;
	height: 450px;
	background-color: #EAEAEA;
	font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;
	-webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;
	font-size: 18px;
	color: #5e5e5e;
  line-height: 22px;
}

/* HEADER */ .pagename {
	text-align: left;
	color: #0981C1;
	font-style: italic;
  font-size: 22px;
  line-height: 24px;
  border-left: 3px solid lightgrey;
  padding-left: 15px;
 }

/* FOOTER */ .shape_footer {
	border-top: 1px solid darkgrey;
	border-bottom: 1px solid #144d74;
	box-shadow: inset 0 1px 0 white;
	background: rgb(140,196,236);
	background: -moz-linear-gradient(top, rgba(140,196,236,1) 0%, rgba(144,194,229,1) 3%, rgba(55,150,223,1) 98%, rgba(58,136,192,1) 100%);
	background: -webkit-gradient(linear, left top, left bottom, color-stop(0%, rgba(140,196,236,1)), color-stop(3%, rgba(144,194,229,1)), color-stop(98%, rgba(55,150,223,1)), color-stop(100%, rgba(58,136,192,1)));
	background: -webkit-linear-gradient(top, rgba(140,196,236,1) 0%, rgba(144,194,229,1) 3%, rgba(55,150,223,1) 98%, rgba(58,136,192,1) 100%);
	background: -o-linear-gradient(top, rgba(140,196,236,1) 0%, rgba(144,194,229,1) 3%, rgba(55,150,223,1) 98%, rgba(58,136,192,1) 100%);
	background: -ms-linear-gradient(top, rgba(140,196,236,1) 0%, rgba(144,194,229,1) 3%, rgba(55,150,223,1) 98%, rgba(58,136,192,1) 100%);
	background: linear-gradient(to bottom, rgba(140,196,236,1) 0%, rgba(144,194,229,1) 3%, rgba(55,150,223,1) 98%, rgba(58,136,192,1) 100%);
filter: progid:DXImageTransform.Microsoft.gradient( startColorstr='#8cc4ec', endColorstr='#3a88c0', GradientType=0 );
}

.shape_check {
	background: #C4C4C4;
	border: 1px solid darkgrey;
	box-shadow: inset 0 1px 0 white;
  border-radius: 15px 15px 0 0;
}

/* TEXTS */ .text_paragraph {
	border: 1px solid darkgrey;
	background-color: white;
	color: #686868;
	padding: 20px 25px;
	font-size: 18px;
	line-height: 30px;
}

.text_command {
	border: 1px solid darkgrey;

/*CONNECTION*/.Connection {
     border: 1px solid darkgrey;
	color: #686868;
	padding: 20px;
	background-color: #E5F3FC;
}

.Connection .connectionItem {
	border: none;
	margin: 0 !important;
	padding: 0px !important;
}

.Connection .connectionLeftColumn .content, .Connection .connectionRightColumn .content {
	border: none;
	height: 100%;
	padding: 0px !important;
	margin: 0px !important;
	width: 250px;
}

.Connection .connectionLeftColumn .connectionItem .innerWrapper, .Connection .connectionRightColumn .connectionItem .innerWrapper {
	cursor: pointer;
	border: 1px solid darkgrey;
	margin: 5px 0;
	text-align: left;
	line-height: 20px;
	font-size: 18px;
	padding: 15px;
	font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;
	box-shadow: 0px 1px 2px rgba(0,0,0,0.2), inset 0px 1px 1px white;
	background: #f9f9f9;
	background: -moz-linear-gradient(top, #f9f9f9 0%, #e8e8e8 100%);
	background: -webkit-gradient(linear, left top, left bottom, color-stop(0%, #f9f9f9), color-stop(100%, #e8e8e8));
	background: -webkit-linear-gradient(top, #f9f9f9 0%, #e8e8e8 100%);
	background: -o-linear-gradient(top, #f9f9f9 0%, #e8e8e8 100%);
	background: -ms-linear-gradient(top, #f9f9f9 0%, #e8e8e8 100%);
	background: linear-gradient(to bottom, #f9f9f9 0%, #e8e8e8 100%);
filter: progid:DXImageTransform.Microsoft.gradient( startColorstr='#f9f9f9', endColorstr='#e8e8e8', GradientType=0 );

.Connection .connectionLeftColumn .connectionItem .innerWrapper:hover,  .Connection .connectionRightColumn .connectionItem .innerWrapper:hover, .Connection .connectionLeftColumn .selected .innerWrapper:hover, .Connection .connectionRightColumn .selected .innerWrapper:hover {
	background: #fcfcfc;
	background: -moz-linear-gradient(top, #fcfcfc 0%, #f3f3f3 100%);
	background: -webkit-gradient(linear, left top, left bottom, color-stop(0%, #fcfcfc), color-stop(100%, #f3f3f3));
	background: -webkit-linear-gradient(top, #fcfcfc 0%, #f3f3f3 100%);
	background: -o-linear-gradient(top, #fcfcfc 0%, #f3f3f3 100%);
	background: -ms-linear-gradient(top, #fcfcfc 0%, #f3f3f3 100%);
	background: linear-gradient(to bottom, #fcfcfc 0%, #f3f3f3 100%);
filter: progid:DXImageTransform.Microsoft.gradient( startColorstr='#fcfcfc', endColorstr='#f3f3f3', GradientType=0 );

.Connection .connectionLeftColumn .selected .innerWrapper, .Connection .connectionRightColumn .selected .innerWrapper {
	cursor: pointer;
	color: black;
	box-shadow: 0px 1px 2px rgba(0,0,0,0.2), inset 0px 1px 1px white;

.Connection .connectionLeftColumn .connectionItem .icon {

.Connection .connectionLeftColumn .connectionItem .iconWrapper, .Connection .connectionRightColumn .connectionItem .iconWrapper {

	border-radius:10px;

.Connection .connectionLeftColumn .selected .iconWrapper, .Connection .connectionRightColumn .selected .iconWrapper {

	width: 5px;
	background: black;
}

.Connection .connectionRightColumn .connectionItem .icon {

}

 .Connection .content {
	height: auto;
  	-webkit-text-size-adjust:100% !important;
}

.Connection_BoxHeight .content {
	height: 100%;
}

/*-------------- WYGASZANIE GAP ------------*/.ic_gap-empty {
	background: url('/file/serve/1305');
	background-repeat: no-repeat;
}

.ic_draggableGapEmpty-empty {
	background: url('/file/serve/1305') 0px 0px #efeeee !important;
	background-repeat: no-repeat !important;
}

.ic_draggableGapEmpty-disabled {
	background: url('/file/serve/1305') 0px 0px #efeeee !important;
	background-repeat: no-repeat !important;
}

select:disabled {
	color: transparent;
	background: url('/file/serve/1305') #FCFCFC 0px -1px;
	background-repeat: no-repeat;
}

input:disabled {
	border-color: #B7B7B7 !important;
	background: url('/file/serve/1305') #FCFCFC;
	background-repeat: no-repeat;
	opacity: 1.0;
}

.multiplegap_inactive {
	border-color: #B7B7B7 !important;
	background: #FCFCFC !important;
}

/* ORDERING */ .ic_ordering {
    border: 1px solid darkgrey;
	color: #686868;
	padding: 20px;
	background-color: #E5F3FC;
}

.ic_ordering-item {
	cursor:pointer;
	color: #5e5e5e;
	line-height: 22px;
	font-size: 18px;
	font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;
	margin: 5px;
	border: 1px solid #bcbcbc;
	border-top: 1px solid lightgrey;
	border-bottom: 1px solid darkgrey;
	text-align: center;
	box-shadow: 1px 1px 2px rgba(0,0,0,0.2), inset 0 1px 0 white;
	border-radius: 0px;
	padding: 5px 8px;
	background: #f9f9f9;
	background: -moz-linear-gradient(top, #f9f9f9 0%, #e8e8e8 100%);
	background: -webkit-gradient(linear, left top, left bottom, color-stop(0%, #f9f9f9), color-stop(100%, #e8e8e8));
	background: -webkit-linear-gradient(top, #f9f9f9 0%, #e8e8e8 100%);
	background: -o-linear-gradient(top, #f9f9f9 0%, #e8e8e8 100%);
	background: -ms-linear-gradient(top, #f9f9f9 0%, #e8e8e8 100%);
	background: linear-gradient(to bottom, #f9f9f9 0%, #e8e8e8 100%);
filter: progid:DXImageTransform.Microsoft.gradient( startColorstr='#f9f9f9', endColorstr='#e8e8e8', GradientType=0 );
}

.ic_ordering-item:hover {
background: #fcfcfc;
	background: -moz-linear-gradient(top, #fcfcfc 0%, #f3f3f3 100%);
	background: -webkit-gradient(linear, left top, left bottom, color-stop(0%, #fcfcfc), color-stop(100%, #f3f3f3));
	background: -webkit-linear-gradient(top, #fcfcfc 0%, #f3f3f3 100%);
	background: -o-linear-gradient(top, #fcfcfc 0%, #f3f3f3 100%);
	background: -ms-linear-gradient(top, #fcfcfc 0%, #f3f3f3 100%);
	background: linear-gradient(to bottom, #fcfcfc 0%, #f3f3f3 100%);
filter: progid:DXImageTransform.Microsoft.gradient( startColorstr='#fcfcfc', endColorstr='#f3f3f3', GradientType=0 );
}

.ic_drag-source {
	box-shadow: 1px 5px 6px rgba(0,0,0,0.2), inset 0 1px 0 white;
	position:relative;
	top:-2px;
	background: white;
  color: black;
}

.ic_ordering-item-correct {
	cursor:default;
	box-shadow: 0px 0px 4px 1px green;
	background: white;
}

.ic_ordering-item-correct:hover, .ic_ordering-item-wrong:hover {
	cursor: default;
	background: white;
}

.ic_ordering-item-wrong {
	cursor: default;
	box-shadow: 0px 0px 4px 1px red;
	background: white;
}

/* TRUE FALSE */.tf_radio, .tf_checkbox {
     border: 1px solid darkgrey;
	color: #686868;
	padding: 0 0px 5px 0px;
	background-color: #E5F3FC;
  border-spacing: 0;
}

.tf_radio_question.first {
	background-color: #f4fafd;
}

.tf_radio_text, .tf_checkbox_text {
	color: darkgrey;
	font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;
	font-size: 16px;
	border: 0;
	border-radius: 0;
	margin: 0;
  	background-color: #f4fafd;
}

.tf_radio_image, .tf_checkbox_image {
	border: 0px;
	border-top: 1px lightgrey solid;
	border-radius: 0;
	margin: 5px;
	width: 10px !important;
	cursor: default;
}

.tf_radio_image.last, .tf_checkbox_image.last {
	border: 0px;
	border-top: 1px lightgrey solid;
	border-radius: 0;
}

.tf_radio_question, .tf_checkbox_question {
	border: 0px;
	border-top: 1px lightgrey solid;
	border-radius: 0;
	line-height: 30px;
	font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;
  padding: 0 0 0 20px;
}

.tf_radio_image.up div {
	background-image: none;
	cursor: pointer;
	background: white;
	margin: 10px 25px;
	padding: 3px;
	border-radius: 13px;
	width: 10px;
	height: 10px;
	border: 4px solid darkgrey;
}

.tf_radio_image.up div:hover {
	background-image: none;
	cursor: pointer;
	background: #edf7fd;
	margin: 10px 25px;
	padding: 3px;
	border-radius: 13px;
	width: 10px;
	height: 10px;
	border: 4px solid darkgrey;
}

.tf_radio_image.down div {
	background-image: none;
	cursor: pointer;
	background: grey;
	margin: 10px 25px;
	padding: 3px;
	border-radius: 13px;
	width: 10px;
	height: 10px;
	border: 4px solid white;
	box-shadow: 0px 0px 4px 1px black;
}

.tf_radio_image.down div:hover {
	cursor: default;
}

.tf_radio_image.up.correct div {
	background-image: none;
	box-shadow: 0px 0px 4px 1px green;
	background: white;
	margin: 10px 25px;
	padding: 3px;
	border-radius: 13px;
	width: 10px;
	height: 10px;
	border: 4px solid white;
	cursor: default;
}

.tf_radio_image.down.correct div {
	background-image: none;
	background: grey;
	box-shadow: 0px 0px 4px 1px green;
	margin: 10px 25px;
	padding: 3px;
	border-radius: 13px;
	width: 10px;
	height: 10px;
	border: 4px solid white;
	cursor: default;
}

.tf_radio_image.up.wrong div {
	background-image: none;
	box-shadow: 0px 0px 4px 1px red;
	background: white;
	margin: 10px 25px;
	padding: 3px;
	border-radius: 13px;
	width: 10px;
	height: 10px;
	border: 4px solid white;
	cursor: default;
}

.tf_radio_image.down.wrong div {
	background-image: none;
	background: grey;
	box-shadow: 0px 0px 4px 1px red;
	margin: 10px 25px;
	padding: 3px;
	border-radius: 13px;
	width: 10px;
	height: 10px;
	border: 4px solid white;
	cursor: default;
}

.tf_radio_image.up.disabled div {
	cursor: default;
	background: white;
}

.down.wrong {
	border: none;
	border-top: 1px lightgrey solid !important;
}

.down.correct {
	border: none !important;
	border-top: 1px lightgrey solid !important;
	background: transparent !important;
}

/* REPORT */ .ic_report {
	background-color:#e3e3e3;
	border: 1px solid darkgrey;
	text-shadow: 0 1px 1px rgba(255,255,255,0.7);
	padding: 0px;
	border-radius: 0;
	font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;
	font-size: 16px;
	width: 910px !important;
	position: absolute;
	left: 20px !important;
	top: 20px !important;
	line-height:18px !important;
}

.ic_report td {
	padding: 18px 10px;
}

.ic_report td:nth-child(3) {
	color: #4499cf;
}

.ic_report td:nth-child(4) {
	color: #e24e4e}

.ic_report-header {
	font-weight: normal;
	color: #3f3f3f;
	border-radius: 0;
 font-family: Arial !important, Helvetica, sans-serif;
}

.ic_report-header td {
	border-bottom: 1px solid darkgrey !important;
}

.ic_report-footer {
 font-family: Arial !important, Helvetica, sans-serif;
	font-weight: bold;
	color: #3f3f3f;
}

.ic_report-footer td {
	border-top: 1px solid darkgrey !important;
}

.ic_report-odd {
	background-color: white;
}

.ic_report-even {
	background-color: #eef8ff;
}

.ic_report .ic_progress {
	height: 15px;
	padding: 0px;
	box-shadow: inset 1px 1px 1px #ababab, 1px 1px 1px white;
	border-radius:30px;
	text-align: center;
	line-height:10px;
	color:#cc0707;
	border-color:#bbbbbb;
	border-top-color:#656565;
	border-left-color:#878585;
	border-width:1px;
	border-style:solid;
	background: -webkit-gradient(linear, left top, left bottom, from(#bdbdbd), to(#e7e7e7));
	background: -webkit-linear-gradient(top, #bdbdbd, #e7e7e7);
	background: -moz-linear-gradient(top, #bdbdbd, #e7e7e7);
	background: -ms-linear-gradient(top, #bdbdbd, #e7e7e7);
	background: -o-linear-gradient(top, #bdbdbd, #e7e7e7);
}

.ic_report .ic_progress-bar {
	border-radius: 30px;
	box-shadow: inset 0px 1px 1px white, inset 0px -10px 20px rgba(0,0,0,0.2), 1px 1px 2px black;
	background-color: lightgrey;
	-webkit-background-size: 7px 7px;
	background-image: 	-webkit-gradient(linear, 100% 0%, 0% 100%, from(white), color-stop(0.15, white), color-stop(0.15, #8cbce6), color-stop(0.50, #8cbce6), color-stop(0.50, white), color-stop(0.65, white), color-stop(0.65, #8cbce6), to(#8cbce6));
}

.ic_report .ic_progress-text {
	line-height: 16px;
	font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;
	font-size: 17px;
	padding: 0 0 0 180px;
	color: grey;
}

/*--- image identification ---*/.image-identification-element {
  	background: white;
	border: 5px solid white;
	padding: 1px;
  	box-shadow: 3px 3px 10px 0 rgba(0,0,0,0.5);
}

.image-identification-element-mouse-hover {
    background: white;
	border: solid 5px #afafaf;
	padding:1px;
	cursor: pointer;
    box-shadow: 3px 3px 10px 0 rgba(0,0,0,0.5);
}

.image-identification-element-selected {
    background: white;
	border: solid 5px #06A4E2;
	padding:1px;
    box-shadow: 3px 3px 10px 0 rgba(0,0,0,0.5);
}

.image-identification-element-correct {
    background: white;
	border: solid 5px #309728;
	padding:1px;
    box-shadow: 3px 3px 10px 0 rgba(0,0,0,0.5);
}

.image-identification-element-incorrect {
    background: white;
	border: solid 5px #f01111;
	padding:1px;
    box-shadow: 3px 3px 10px 0 rgba(0,0,0,0.5);
}

.image-identification-element-empty {
    background: white;
	border: solid 5px white;
	padding:1px;
    box-shadow: 3px 3px 10px 0 rgba(0,0,0,0.5);
}

 }

filter: progid:DXImageTransform.Microsoft.gradient( startColorstr='#8cc4ec', endColorstr='#3a88c0', GradientType=0 );

/* TEXTS */ .text_paragraph {
	border: 1px solid darkgrey;
	background-color: white;

/* TRUE FALSE */.tf_radio, .tf_checkbox {

	margin: 0;
  	background-color: #f4fafd;
}

	margin: 10px 25px;

	border-radius: 13px;

	height: 10px;
	border: 4px solid darkgrey;

	border-radius: 13px;

}

	border-radius: 13px;

	height: 10px;
	border: 4px solid white;

	border-radius: 13px;
	width: 10px;
	height: 10px;

 font-family: Arial !important, Helvetica, sans-serif;

.ic_report .ic_progress-bar {

/* TRUE FALSE */.tf_radio, .tf_checkbox {
     border: 1px solid darkgrey;
	color: #686868;
	padding: 0 0px 5px 0px;
	background-color: #E5F3FC;
  border-spacing: 0;
}

.tf_radio_question.first {
	background-color: #f4fafd;
}

.tf_radio_text, .tf_checkbox_text {
	color: darkgrey;
	font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;
	font-size: 16px;
	border: 0;
	border-radius: 0;
	margin: 0;
  	background-color: #f4fafd;
}

.tf_radio_image, .tf_checkbox_image {
	border: 0px;
	border-top: 1px lightgrey solid;
	border-radius: 0;
	margin: 5px;
	width: 10px !important;
	cursor: default;
}

.tf_radio_image.last, .tf_checkbox_image.last {
	border: 0px;
	border-top: 1px lightgrey solid;
	border-radius: 0;
}

.tf_radio_question, .tf_checkbox_question {
	border: 0px;
	border-top: 1px lightgrey solid;
	border-radius: 0;
	line-height: 30px;
	font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;
  padding: 0 0 0 20px;
}

.tf_radio_image.up div {
	background-image: none;
	cursor: pointer;
	background: white;
	margin: 10px 25px;
	padding: 3px;
	border-radius: 13px;
	width: 10px;
	height: 10px;
	border: 4px solid darkgrey;
}

.tf_radio_image.up div:hover {
	background-image: none;
	cursor: pointer;
	background: #edf7fd;
	margin: 10px 25px;
	padding: 3px;
	border-radius: 13px;
	width: 10px;
	height: 10px;
	border: 4px solid darkgrey;
}

.tf_radio_image.down div {
	background-image: none;
	cursor: pointer;
	background: grey;
	margin: 10px 25px;
	padding: 3px;
	border-radius: 13px;
	width: 10px;
	height: 10px;
	border: 4px solid white;
	box-shadow: 0px 0px 4px 1px black;
}

.tf_radio_image.down div:hover {
	cursor: default;
}

.tf_radio_image.up.correct div {
	background-image: none;
	box-shadow: 0px 0px 4px 1px green;
	background: white;
	margin: 10px 25px;
	padding: 3px;
	border-radius: 13px;
	width: 10px;
	height: 10px;
	border: 4px solid white;
	cursor: default;
}

.tf_radio_image.down.correct div {
	background-image: none;
	background: grey;
	box-shadow: 0px 0px 4px 1px green;
	margin: 10px 25px;
	padding: 3px;
	border-radius: 13px;
	width: 10px;
	height: 10px;
	border: 4px solid white;
	cursor: default;
}

.tf_radio_image.up.wrong div {
	background-image: none;
	box-shadow: 0px 0px 4px 1px red;
	background: white;
	margin: 10px 25px;
	padding: 3px;
	border-radius: 13px;
	width: 10px;
	height: 10px;
	border: 4px solid white;
	cursor: default;
}

.tf_radio_image.down.wrong div {
	background-image: none;
	background: grey;
	box-shadow: 0px 0px 4px 1px red;
	margin: 10px 25px;
	padding: 3px;
	border-radius: 13px;
	width: 10px;
	height: 10px;
	border: 4px solid white;
	cursor: default;
}

.tf_radio_image.up.disabled div {
	cursor: default;
	background: white;
}

.down.wrong {
	border: none;
	border-top: 1px lightgrey solid !important;
}

.down.correct {
	border: none !important;
	border-top: 1px lightgrey solid !important;
	background: transparent !important;
}

/* REPORT */ .ic_report {
	background-color:#e3e3e3;
	border: 1px solid darkgrey;

	font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;

}

 font-family: Arial !important, Helvetica, sans-serif;

 font-family: Arial !important, Helvetica, sans-serif;

}

}

}

.ic_report .ic_progress {

	box-shadow: inset 1px 1px 1px #ababab, 1px 1px 1px white;
	border-radius:30px;
	text-align: center;
	line-height:10px;
	color:#cc0707;
	border-color:#bbbbbb;
	border-top-color:#656565;
	border-left-color:#878585;
	border-width:1px;
	border-style:solid;
	background: -webkit-gradient(linear, left top, left bottom, from(#bdbdbd), to(#e7e7e7));
	background: -webkit-linear-gradient(top, #bdbdbd, #e7e7e7);
	background: -moz-linear-gradient(top, #bdbdbd, #e7e7e7);
	background: -ms-linear-gradient(top, #bdbdbd, #e7e7e7);
	background: -o-linear-gradient(top, #bdbdbd, #e7e7e7);

.ic_report .ic_progress-bar {
	border-radius: 30px;
	box-shadow: inset 0px 1px 1px white, inset 0px -10px 20px rgba(0,0,0,0.2), 1px 1px 2px black;
	background-color: lightgrey;
	-webkit-background-size: 7px 7px;
	background-image: 	-webkit-gradient(linear, 100% 0%, 0% 100%, from(white), color-stop(0.15, white), color-stop(0.15, #8cbce6), color-stop(0.50, #8cbce6), color-stop(0.50, white), color-stop(0.65, white), color-stop(0.65, #8cbce6), to(#8cbce6));
}

.ic_report .ic_progress-text {
	line-height: 16px;

	font-size: 17px;
	padding: 0 0 0 180px;
